gitea.description: Gitea is a community managed painless self-hosted Git service

3000.description: Gitea web UI port. Suggested default: 3000
3000.label: Web port

/data.description: Choose a Share for all gitea data. Eg: create a Share called gitea for this purpose.
/data.label: Data

USER_UID.label: User
USER_UID.description: User that owns the gitea volume

USER_GID.label: Group
USER_GID.description: Group the user owning the gitea volume is in.

APP_NAME.label: Instance name
APP_NAME.description: Name of the gitea instance, used in the page title. Default: Gitea: Git with a cup of tea

SSH_PORT.label: Exposed SSH port
SSH_PORT.description: SSH port displayed in clone URL. Default: 22

SSH_DOMAIN.label: SSH Domain
SSH_DOMAIN.description: Domain name of this server, used for the displayed clone URL in Giteaâ€™s UI. Default: localhost

DISABLE_REGISTRATION.label: Disable registration
DISABLE_REGISTRATION.description: Disable registration, after which only admin can create accounts for users. Default: false

REQUIRE_SIGNIN_VIEW.label: Require sign in
REQUIRE_SIGNIN_VIEW.description: Enable this to force users to log in to view any page. Default: false

gitea.more_info: To set up, visit the web UI.
